definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
to take a walk/to go for a walk
radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
loose goods/goods sold open/draft (of beer, as opposed to bottled)

sentences.english: I think the EDG probably uses a low astigmatism eyepiece design like the SE.
sentences.chinese: 我想EDG可能使用了象SE一样的低像散目镜设计。

sentences.english: He buys fine pottery for his wife and takes long walks with her on Sunday afternoons.
sentences.chinese: 他给老婆买精致的瓷器，星期天下午带她散很长的步。

sentences.english: Objective:Research Qiwei safflower Shushen powder on the protective effect of liver injury.
sentences.chinese: 本论文研究七味红花殊胜散对肝损伤的保护作用。

sentences.english: When Washington ordered troops into the area, the opposition collapsed without a fight.
sentences.chinese: 在华盛顿下令军队开进该地区时，抗争者不战而散。

sentences.english: The "witchcraft" line referred to Franklin's imminent departure.
sentences.chinese: 这里的“巫术”散去暗指富兰克林即将离开。

sentences.english: Want to go for a walk and come back later?
sentences.chinese: 想去散下步然后再回来吗？

sentences.english: Grieved emotion is the heavy experience, it is difficult to disappear.
sentences.chinese: 哀怨情感内敛凝聚，是沉重的体验，易郁结不散。

sentences.english: The notables then went away, and on the third day they all came with shaved heads.
sentences.chinese: 宴会散了，可第三天那些名人显贵都剃了光头来赴宴。

sentences.english: Bedding was strewn on the floor and dirty teacups stacked in a corner.
sentences.chinese: 寝具散在地板上，脏兮兮的茶具塞在角落里。

sentences.english: A few dark blue inflammatory cells are scattered within the atheroma.
sentences.chinese: 一些暗蓝色的炎细胞散在分布于粥样硬化病灶内。

sentences.english: The morning mist drew up and disclosed the village in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 晨雾散去，现出了远外的村庄。

sentences.english: Taking a walk is what you need.
sentences.chinese: 散一下步是你所需要的。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of external application of Xiaoji powder on the gastrointestinal motility.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中药消积散外敷对胃肠动力的影响。

sentences.english: The latter available five disperse or five skins fragrant drinks.
sentences.chinese: 后者可用五荃散或五皮饮。

sentences.english: The dark clouds will dissolve and peace and clarity will return.
sentences.chinese: 乌云将散去而和平与明净将回归。

sentences.english: Lamp shadow dispersed with water in the lake forming a circle of light ripples.
sentences.chinese: 灯影随着水波向湖中散去，形成一圈圈光的涟漪。

definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
coming together and separating/aggregation and dissipation
to disperse/to scatter in all directions
emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
